about_the_game:
Experience the thrilling adventure in this Bike Attack Racing Game.

Attack the rivals while you are racing!

Race on different tracks and compete with other racers.

Race on Bike as an Outlaw Bike Trickster n Master on your Simulator Off-road Racing Bike performing flippy Race stunts across unusually challenging Highway Traffic Obstacles and other 3D Off-road Motocross Stunt hurdles.

Cops off-road games Dirt Bike Racing Motocross games


Escape both Police Cops And Criminal Robbers who are out to get you on Off-road Motocross tracks.

Escape Amazing Racing Obstacles or Smash and Crash them in this game of destruction.

Some Interesting Hurdles Include:
1. Chasing Police Cop Cars & Race on Off-road motocross
2. Robbers Helicopter & Racing
3. Flying Plane Race
4. Flippy Diving Stunt Ramps
5. Monster Truck Race
6. MMX 2XL MX Motor Bike
7. Comic Tricksters Racing
8. Bump The Color Hurdles Race
9. Hot Wheels Cars Racing
10. Highway Traffic Obstacles on Off-road motocross
11. Highway Traffic Ramp Wheels

and more

Try to complete all the levels, in this adrenaline action-packed, heart-thumping Flippy Dirt Bike Racing game.

Features:

-Incredible physics engine that provides realistic-looking behavior to the bike and rider.

-Unique and smooth game play.

- Addictive, exciting and hard levels.


-Earn stars for your best local times.

Let us Play Dirt Bike Race off-road Motocross Flippy Stunts games And Break The Top Score. You will love each level in these games. It is not a single game but a lot of games in one. Each level in this game can be considered as a game for fun motocross off-road games lovers.

So Bike Riders and Bike game Lovers! What are you waiting for? If you like to Race & Race and race more, this game is for you. If you like Bike Racing and some more bike racing this game is for you. If you love Motorcycle racing and then some more Motorcycle racing then this game is for you. In short, this is best of Off-road games or Motocross Games.

Good luck and have fun!!!

developers: Enaayah Software Development and Services Private Limited

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Most recent version of Ubuntu LTS with the Unity, Gnome, or KDE desktops
  • Processor: 2011 or newer Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia or ATi GPU with 1GB Memory
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8+
  • Processor: 2011 or newer Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia or ATi GPU with 1GB Memory
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

name: Racing Bike Fight (Corona Virus Lockdown Special)

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Racing Bike Fight (Corona Virus Lockdown Special)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 32-bit SP1
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.8Ghz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10 compatible or better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows-based sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

publishers: Enaayah Software Development and Services Private Limited
